adapt.utils.toy_regression¶

adapt.utils.toy_regression(n_samples=100, n_target_labeled=3, random_state=0)[source]¶

Generate toy regression dataset for DA.

Parameters
n_samplesint, optional (default=100)

Size of source and target samples.

n_target_labeledint, optional (default=3)

Size of target labeled sample.

random_state: int, optional (default=0)

Random state number.

Returns
Xnumpy array

Input data

ynumpy array

Labels

src_indexnumpy array

Source indexes.

tgt_indexnumpy array

Target indexes.

tgt_index_labelednumpy array

Target indexes labeled.
